sense.def:
A passage
je dolg ozek prostor med stenama ali ograjama, ki povezuje dve sobi ali prostora.

seg.quote: At the end of the narrow passage was a bathroom.
We went along a little passage to the garden.

sense.def:
A passage
je en del v knjigi, govoru ali glasbenem delu.

seg.quote: The flute and oboe have long solo passages.

sense.def:
The passage of someone or something
je gibanje ali napredovanje te osebe ali stvari od ene točke do druge.

seg.quote: The wind of the train's passage ruffled his hair.
...the moment of passage from one state to the next.

sense.def:
A passage
je tudi potovanje z ladjo.

seg.quote: The passage across to Belfast was very rough.
